availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jane Lawes (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky,,keeper of a house of prostitution)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, sex worker and madam. Kentucky resident. Mother of Alice Catherine Lawes and Alex Gilmore Lawes. Attended school in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Sex worker and madam in Louisville in 1860. Fined for tippling in Louisville in 1860. Fine remitted by Governor Beriah Magoffin in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 405B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 2, p. 595.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 3, p. 253A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County,, Louisville, p. 17.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 007723023.
